name: ssh-ubuntupc
description: Execute commands on a remote server via SSH with optional command wrapper (e.g., srt for sandboxing)

ssh_host.title: SSH Host
ssh_host.description: Hostname or IP address of the remote server

ssh_key.title: SSH Private Key Path
ssh_key.description: Full path to SSH private key (e.g., C:\\Users\\YourUsername\\.ssh\\id_ed25519)

command_timeout.title: Command Timeout (seconds)
command_timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for command completion (default: 15 seconds)

command_wrapper.title: Command Wrapper
command_wrapper.description: Optional wrapper command (e.g., 'srt' for sandboxing, 'timeout 30' for time limits, or leave empty for direct execution)

tool_name.title: Tool Name
tool_name.description: Name displayed in Claude UI for this tool (e.g., 'ssh-kali', 'ssh-ubuntupc'). Helps distinguish between multiple SSH servers.

tools.name: ssh-ubuntupc
tools.description: Execute a command on the remote server
